documentation.text:
@notice Enforces that the minimum bet is 1 Finney (0.001 ETH)
 @param ante The bet placed on the current round, reverts if too low

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Minimum side bet is too low"

arguments.value: Minimum side bet is too low

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Minimum side bet is too low"

documentation.text: @notice Requests randomness from a user-provided seed
@notice Checks values against the Bet type and determines a winner, loser or re-roll according to craps rules

@notice Pay out method, awarded if roller wins.
 @dev Applied nonReentrant modifier to provide protection against recursive reentrancy attack
Requests the address of the Chainlink Token on this network

@dev Getter function mainly used for testing purposes
 @return Returns the type of bet for the current round

devdoc.author: Calvin S. Lee
devdoc.details: Currently only deployed on the Kovan network

constructor.details: Constructor inherits VRFConsumerBaseNetwork: KovanVRF coordinator address: 0xdD3782915140c8f3b190B5D67eAc6dc5760C46E9LINK token address:                0xa36085F69e2889c224210F603D836748e7dC0088Key Hash: 0x6c3699283bda56ad74f6b855546325b68d482e983852a7a82979cc4807b641f4

params._linkTokenAddress: Initialize the contract with the appropriate link address for network
params._vrfCoordinatorAddress: Initialize contract with correct vrf coordinator (for random number)

createGame(uint8).details: Is a payable function and which the value is checked against the minimum bet to see if valid

params.typeBet: The type of bet for the current round; Pass or No Pass

getCurrentBetType().details: Getter function mainly used for testing purposes

returns._0: Returns the type of bet for the current round

getCurrentRollValues(uint256).details: Getter function mainly used for testing purposes

params.dieNum: The die whose face value is being requested

returns._0: Returns the value of either die 1 or die 2

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: A simulation of a single person craps game

createGame(uint8).notice: Creates a betting round and maps it to games. Will only create a new round if the current round is finished.

evaluateRoll().notice: Checks values against the Bet type and determines a winner, loser or re-roll according to craps rules

getChainlinkToken().notice: Requests the address of the Chainlink Token on this network

getRandomNumber().notice: Requests randomness from a user-provided seed

userdoc.notice: You can use this contract to simulate a craps game; betting with ether
